title: Asagi Iro No Saudade
alternative_title: あさぎ色のサウダージ
status: あさぎ色のサウダージ
description:
Description :
        Ren Fujisawa could not find a place in her hometown or in Tokyo where the pieces of her identity fit together. She was about to give up on everything, when the person who appeared in front of her was the person she missed the most in the world, the person she wanted to see more than anything else in the world, the person she wanted to see so badly that she would die.A promising, delicately and emotionally depicts a human story that will sink deep into your heart, especially in this time when everyone is lonely.
